events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to return it because it doesn't fit well and I need a refund as soon as possible.
Classified the customer's issue under Refund due to request for return and money back.
Assigned refund specialist to handle the customer's return request for the jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket return. I'm here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can start processing your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the jacket is too small even though I ordered my usual size.
Thank you for the info. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we'll email you shortly, and once received, we will refund your payment within 5 business days.
Okay, that sounds good. I appreciate you sending the label quickly so I can make the return without extra cost.
The prepaid label has been sent to your email address. Please ship the jacket back at your earliest convenience to complete the refund.
Just following up to check if you received the refund and if everything went smoothly with your jacket return.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for the quick and easy service!
Closing the case as the refund has been processed successfully and the customer is satisfied.
Sent a satisfaction survey invitation to the customer to gather feedback about their recent support experience.
